title: The Artisan of the Morning Mist: Painting the Azure Dragon Mural
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, professional digital illustration, ultra detailed, cinematic volumetric lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio. A talented young Chinese woman in flowing white Hanfu attire, standing on a sturdy bamboo scaffold, delicately painting a magnificent blue and gold oriental dragon mural intertwined with vibrant pink cherry blossoms (sakura) on a traditional white brick wall. Soft dawn light casts a warm glow on the foggy, wet cobblestone street lined with glowing Chinese lanterns and classical curved-roof architecture receding into the background mist. Dynamic pose, intricate scale patterns on the dragon. Donghua Chinese style, depth of field, art by Zhaohuan.
